title: The Saddlemaker
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Tim Wilson and Grant Crabtree
brief_description: From Alberta’s cowboy country, a story of a young girl’s first love, a saddle. Every saddle that leaves Felmer Eamor’s shop becomes a proud possession. In this film you sympathise with a fourteen-year-old girl’s wish to have such a saddle, and the bluff she pulls to get it.
creator_credit_for_label: ONF | NFB, Tim Wilson and Grant Crabtree
